    • Method Detail

      • globalTag

        public PLogConfig.Builder globalTag(@NonNull
                                    String val)
        Set global tag for all logs, param should not be null.

      • forceConcatGlobalTag

        public PLogConfig.Builder forceConcatGlobalTag(boolean val)
        If set to true, all tags will be appended after global tag, regardless of it is an auto tag or explicit tag. We recommend you set to true if you've set a `global tag`.

      • useAutoTag

        public PLogConfig.Builder useAutoTag(boolean val)
        If set to true(as default option), use class name as tag.
        Since:
        1.2.0

      • emptyMsgLevel

        public PLogConfig.Builder emptyMsgLevel(int val)
        Set level for empty log. Default is 
        Log.DEBUG
        .
        Parameters:
        val - Must be one of Log.VERBOSE, Log.DEBUG, Log.INFO, Log.WARN, Log.ERROR. Otherwise this param is ignored.

      • emptyMsg

        public PLogConfig.Builder emptyMsg(@NonNull
                                   String val)
        Set default message for log printed by calling PLog.empty().

      • keepLineNumber

        public PLogConfig.Builder keepLineNumber(boolean val)
        Deprecated. This method name is a little ambiguous, use needLineNumber(boolean) instead.
        If set to true, the line number info will be printed in log message.

      • needLineNumber

        public PLogConfig.Builder needLineNumber(boolean val)
        If set to true, the source line number info will be printed in log message.

      • globalStackOffset

        public PLogConfig.Builder globalStackOffset(int val)
        Set a global stack offset.

        The recommended value is your wrapper level to `PLog` calls. If you use PLog.xxx() directly, you DO NOT need this method.

      • globalInterceptor

        public PLogConfig.Builder globalInterceptor(@Nullable
                                            Interceptor val)
        Register a global interceptor, useful for handle different app environments etc.

      • keepThreadInfo

        @Deprecated
public PLogConfig.Builder keepThreadInfo(boolean val)
        Deprecated. This method name is a little ambiguous, use needThreadInfo(boolean) instead.

      • needThreadInfo

        public PLogConfig.Builder needThreadInfo(boolean val)
        If set to true, thread info will be printed into log message.

      • maxRecursiveDepth

        public PLogConfig.Builder maxRecursiveDepth(int depth)
        Set max depth limit when recursively format objects. If you do not use `formatter` dependency, you don't need this option as well.
        Parameters:
        depth - should be positive. pass non-positive value will totally disable recursive formatting.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • build

        public PLogConfig build()
